title: Short Stuff: The Santa Claus Association
itunes:title: Short Stuff: The Santa Claus Association
description:
If a con man manages to make needy Christmas wishes come true is he still a con man? (Also, Merry Christmas!)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
